title: Box of honor probleem
body:
Hey 
Today I received a box of honor level 5 and clicked on ok. 
Then i opened loot and there is no box in there. 
I closed LOL and restarted checked loot again but still no box. 
What can I do to find the box?
Thank you!

replies.body: Ahhhh I think you got that popup confused for receiving an honor capsule. That notification was telling you that you had earned the Honor 5 Ward skin from the end of season honor rewards. You'll be able to find that ward in your ward collection during champion select. Should be able to check it out in a custom or practice game.
